This page is used to demonstrate Front forms

Form page with recaptcha v2

Help Center links:

  • How to set up a form inbox in Front

Code used on this page:

<script type="text/javascript">
  var onloadCallback = function() {
    grecaptcha.render('html_element', {sitekey: '6Le18fUUAAAAAAlrJc_b44QLFjPFDmK59CuWhFFF'});
  };
</script>
<form
  method="POST"
  name="fa-form-1"
  action="https://webhook.frontapp.com/forms/front/InVslqYPqywr50N6kaDVNd9knltlPlKGFfAC-fFaw7z1LDKX2dtvnSULh8OTFjpsPa323MLClJRFPnJPMXZvb3qecPMg7gDpAw"
  enctype="multipart/form-data"
  accept-charset="utf-8"
>
  <div>
    <label for="name">Name</label>
    <input type="text" name="name">
  </div>

  <div>
    <label for="email">Email</label>
    <input type="email" name="email">
  </div>

  <div>
    <textarea name="differentbodyname"></textarea>
  </div>

  <div>
    <input type="hidden" name="body" value="ignore"></input>
  </div>

  <div>
    <input type="file" name="attachment">
  </div>

   <div id="html_element"></div>
  <div>
    <input type="submit" value="Send">
  </div>
<script src="https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api.js?onload=onloadCallback&render=explicit" async defer></script>
</form>
